entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS AROUND 50

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
